name: reconstitute
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to change food that has been dried back into its original form by adding water: The powdered milk/egg can be reconstituted by adding water.
to change an organization so that it has a different form: The Health Education Council has been reconstituted as the Health Education Authority.
